title: CONTRACT AND BILL OF SALE FOR AUTOMOBILE
intro: ("Seller") agrees to sell to ____________________ ("Buyer") the following automobile:
Vehicle: [specify make, model and year of car], Vehicle Identification Number (VIN): ____________ (the "Vehicle").
clauses: The date of the sale of the Vehicle will be _____________, 20__.
The total purchase price of the Vehicle will be ____________ Dollars ($__________).
In exchange for Vehicle, on the day of the sale, Buyer will pay Seller the total purchase price by cashierâ€™s check, money order, or cash.
Upon receipt of payment, Seller agrees to provide Buyer with the Certificate of Title and the current registration for the Vehicle.
The Vehicle is sold "as is". Seller makes no express or implied warranties as to the condition or performance of the Vehicle.
The Buyer agrees to register the Vehicle in his/her name with the Department of Motor Vehicles within one week of the date of sale.
other_points: The Seller should file a Notice of Transfer and Release of Liability with the DMV within 5 days of the sale.
The Buyer must go to the DMV to complete the transfer of ownership within 10 days of the sale.
